m_szDocTitle: BMW’s Path Towards Hydrogen fuelled cars
m_szDocSumamry: BMW’s Path Towards Hydrogen fuelled cars News Share: Rumours are spreading that BMW is knee deep in plans to develop Hydrogen fuel cell cars, with blueprints for a 7 Series model and more recently, a hydrogen powered i8 prototype. The public’s interests seem to be solely focused on Battery Electric Vehicles that are currently being spearheaded by the production of the Tesla Model S and the Chevrolet Bolt.
